tr.td: A guideline-based vaccine administration is recorded entirely on paper, with the digital content captured later (as a “back data entry” workflow) and uploaded to the Public Health Authority (PHA).
A guideline-based vaccine administration is recorded using an offline digital health solution with the content uploaded, subsequently, to the PHA.
A guideline-based vaccine administration is recorded using an online digital health solution which updates the content, in real time, to the PHA.
A verifier verifies an SVC using purely manual (visual) means.
A verifier verifies an SVC, using digital cryptographic processes, in an offline mode.
A verifier verifies an SVC, using digital cryptographic processes, in an online mode that includes a status check against the public health authority’s SVC Registry.

A verifier verifies an internationally issued SVC, using digital cryptographic processes, in an online mode that includes a status check against the national public health authority’s SVC Registry, which in turn accesses the international public health authority’s SVC Registry.
